name: Academic Suicide
description:
ACADEMIC SUICIDE is an interactive narrative made in Ink. Play as a disillusioned physicist forced to attend a seemingly boring academic conference. Unbeknownst to you and the other attendees, things aren't going to go quite as planned.

This is a WIP and represents only the first part of a multipart narrative. Made by Erwan.

Content warning for brief descriptions of death and body horror.
